SELECT co.coNO ,co.coDate ,ui.com_name ,pro.prodNo ,pro.prodName ,st.strCnt ,pro.delPrice ,co.coCnt ,co.coSts ,co.coDel ,co.coDpsts ,prodCnt FROM tb_cOrder co LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product pro ON co.prodNo = pro.prodNo LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON co.loginID = ui.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_stock st ON pro.prodNo = st.prodNo LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT coNo ,SUM(prodCnt) prodCnt FROM tb_delList GROUP BY coNo ) del ON co.coNo = del.coNo
AND #{startDate} <= co.coDate AND #{endDate} >= co.coDate
AND co.coDpsts = 1
ORDER BY co.coNo DESC LIMIT #{startnum},#{pagesize}

SELECT co.coNO ,co.coDate ,ui.com_name ,pro.prodName ,sum(st.strCnt) ,co.coCnt FROM tb_cOrder co LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product pro ON co.prodNo = pro.prodNo LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON co.loginID = ui.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_stock st ON pro.prodNo = st.prodNo WHERE co.coNO = ${coNo}
SELECT pro.prodNo ,pro.prodName ,sup.supName FROM tb_product pro LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_supplier sup ON pro.supNo = sup.supNo WHERE pro.prodNo = #{prodNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cOrder co
AND #{startDate} <= co.coDate AND #{endDate} >= co.coDate
AND co.coDpsts = 1

SELECT IFNULL( (SELECT strCnt FROM tb_stock WHERE strNo = ${strNo} AND prodNo = ${prodNo} ), 0 ) strCnt FROM tb_stock UNION ALL
SELECT 0 strCnt FROM DUAL
LIMIT 1

SELECT IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(prodCnt) prodCnt FROM tb_delList WHERE coNo = ${coNo} ), 0 ) coNo FROM tb_delList UNION ALL
SELECT 0 coNo FROM DUAL
LIMIT 1
